TEE TIMES
AMC CARD INFO
Membership Information
Please reach out to General Manager Joe Zaleski to receive more information and to not lose your chance to join our Golf & Sports Membership.
Initiation Fee of $995 Applies to each New Golf Membership
Sports initiation fee of $500 and monthly fee of $100
Couple Golf
This membership allows for as much golf as possible for a couple living in the same household. Usage of the entire Sports (tennis, exercise and swim) are included.
Monthly Dues $305/$3,660.
Individual Golf
This membership allows for as much golf as possible for an individual. Usage of the entire Sports area (tennis, exercise and swim) is included.
Monthly Dues $235/$2,820.
Benefits of Halifax Plantation Golf Club
18 Holes of Golf Designed by Bill Amick
Charmed Setting among Live Oak Trees
Two Sided Range Tee and Short Game Practice Area
Professional Golf Instruction
Member and Guest Shopping Discount
Club Charging Account
Discount Range Practice
The Tavern Restaurant
The Pub
NFL Sunday Ticket
Happy Hours
Active Calendar of Events
Live Entertainment
Ballroom
Locker Rooms
Four Clay Tennis Courts
Professional Tennis Instruction
Junior Olympic Size Pool
Exercise Room
Sports Clubhouse
Golf Fees
Eighteen Hole Shared Golf Cart
$23.48
Nine Hole Shared Golf Cart
$15.96
Range Discount
50%
GHIN Golf Handicap
$40
Golf Bag Storage
$89
Clubhouse Locker Rental
$89
Women’s Golf Association
$35
Men’s Golf Association
$80
Golf Guest Fees Vary Based Upon Time of Year
Note: Member Golf walking permitted at twilight times with prior golf shop approval.
Sports Guest Fees
Daily
$10
All Family (7 Days)
$35
Single House Guest (7 days)
$25
Junior (under 22)
$5
Note:
All pricing is subject to change and is prior to appropriate Florida state sales tax. Club facilities do experience down time for required maintenance, weather and weather related conditions or acts of God.
Call for Tee Times and Information
Tee Times:
(386) 676-9600
, ext. 311
